name: Date Kimiko No Virtual Tennis
overview: A tennis game featuring and licensed by 1994 Australian Open semi-finalist Kimiko Date and is one of a handful of tennis sims for the Super Famicom to feature scaling Mode 7 graphics, similar to David Crane's Amazing Tennis. In addition to one-off Exhibition and Tournament modes, the player can take part in a World Tour that covers various global tournaments as well as passively watch advanced tennis strategies with the Tactics mode.
